Icons

Choose Icons

Choose Energy icon font. Apply the associated class name to an <i> or <span> tag. Use font-size and color CSS properties to manipulate size and color respectively.

ce-icon-bolt
ce-icon-smallbusiness
ce-icon-business
ce-icon-chat
ce-icon-commercial
ce-icon-copy
ce-icon-dollar
ce-icon-naturalgas
ce-icon-gas
ce-icon-help
ce-icon-residential
ce-icon-home
ce-icon-lightbulb
ce-icon-electricity
ce-icon-plug
ce-icon-solar
